text:
Hr. Ralph H. Hall, Chairman
Radio and Recording Committee
DA7I-AERT
National Education Association
1201 Sixteenth Street, N. W.
Washington 6, D. C.
Dear Ralpht
I plan to attend the DAVI meeting in Detroit. Would some of these be
the sort of thing you want? They are not available in all cases, but
might stimulate thinking.
Sincerely,
Harry J. Skomia
Executive Director
HJSijy
Enc: Radio & TV Program Ideas
